div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1681 Saqqara, near Memphis, 20 km. S of Cairo, 1968 Burial: c. 260 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 28 AR. Coins, wrapped in cloth, found during excavations; from vi- cinity of Mastaba 3512, North Saqq√¢ra Ptolemy I: 2 tetradr. (as Svoronos 205, 254) Ptolemy II: 11 tetradr. (as Sv. 548 [5], 559 [2], 574 [2], 59 [1], ? [1]) Disposition: London 13; Cairo 15 Information from G. K. Jenkins
